forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with some morning fog. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 47F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Foggy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Low clouds and fog. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 62F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High near 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
